answers.answer: Hello,Frequent urination in females is often due to urinary tract infection or pregnancy. Get your urine examination, urine culture and a pregnancy test done. It can also be due to many reasons which can be physiological or disease-related, and include excessive intake of liquids, diuretic substances (including tea, caffeine, alcohol, certain drugs), anxiety, exposure to cold, diabetes mellitus, diabetes insipidus (central or nephrogenic), urinary tract infections or obstruction, etc to name a few more common ones. I suggest you to take opinion of your doctor who would do a clinical examination and advice for needful tests (such as routine urinanalysis, blood glucose test, blood & urinary osmolalities, ultrasonography of renal system, etc).I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.

question: I am going to the toilet every 5 - minuets and not even drinking alot in the day. I always wee never the other. I am not even constipated and when pass urine it never hurts, I have been on the pill for 2 months now and some bleeding. Is their anything wrong with me?
title: going toilet too much!
